channel.title: Mission Completeocycle
channel.description:
Mission Completeocycle is a blog about all gaming while juggling life, the universe and everything.
All are welcome, but if you know what a betamax type is, you’ll know where we are coming from ;)
Episode 1: Abraham and Francois discuss the origins of their gaming addiction.
channel.itunes:summary:
Mission Completeocycle is a blog about all gaming while juggling life, the universe and everything.
All are welcome, but if you know what a betamax type is, you’ll know where we are coming from ;)
Rules? Where we’re going, there are no rules! All things are in: hardware, software and whatever we felt like at the time.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Mid-life Gaming: Juggling gaming, life, the universe and everything...
channel.itunes:author: Abraham Aucamp; Francois Aucamp

item.dc:creator: Abraham Aucamp; Francois Aucamp
item.description: Abraham and Francois start with a brief introduction of how they got into gaming, taking a quick trip from the very early 80s to today
